name: @sge/starter-template
description: SGE Template - Repeatable tech stack for rapid application development

scripts.android:dev: npm run build:dev && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.android:build: node scripts/increment-android-build.js && npm run build:prod && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:release: node scripts/increment-android-build.js && npm run build:prod && npx cap sync android && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.mobile:setup: npx cap add android && npx cap add ios
scripts.version:increment: npm run version:ios && npm run version:android
scripts.ios:sync: npx cap sync ios && npm run ios:permissions
scripts.ios:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run ios:sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.ios:build: node scripts/increment-ios-build.js && npm run build:prod && npm run ios:sync
scripts.ios:release: node scripts/increment-ios-build.js && npm run build:prod && npm run ios:sync
scripts.generate: cd generator && npm run build && node dist/index.js
